comment.author: 69076848@N05
comment._content: I am using this photo as I homeschool my daughter. We are currently talking about Egypt and the fact this was where Ham's son, Mizraim, settled.  .

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: Glad we could contribute to your daughter's education, delrosaiofamily! If you want to delve deeper into Egyptian history, culture, and artifacts, there are some great resources on the Museum website. Have fun! Deb Wythe Brooklyn Museum Digital Lab
